Package com.gcu.data.repository

Interface PostRepo

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<PostEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<PostEntity,Long>
public interface PostRepo extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<PostEntity,Long>
Database interaction object for the posts table

  • Method Details

    • findByUser

      @Query("SELECT * FROM posts WHERE post_user_id = :userId") List<PostEntity> findByUser(long userId)
      find all the posts of a specific user
      Parameters:
      userId - the id of the user to check
      Returns:
      a list of their posts

    • deleteId

      @Modifying @Query("DELETE FROM posts WHERE id = :id") void deleteId(long id)
      delete a post based on its ID
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the post to change

    • updateContent

      @Modifying @Query("UPDATE posts SET post_content = :content WHERE id = :postId") void updateContent(long postId, String content)
      update the content of a post
      Parameters:
      postId - the ID of the post to update
      content - the new content of the post

    • getPostMetaById

      @Query("SELECT posts.id, posts.post_content, au.username as authorUsername, COALESCE(lc, 0) as likeCount FROM posts LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, username FROM users GROUP BY id) au ON au.id = posts.post_user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_id, count(*) lc FROM likes GROUP BY post_id) ltc ON ltc.post_id = posts.id WHERE posts.id = :id;") PostMetadataEntity getPostMetaById(long id)
      Select and build an API representation of a post entity based on its ID
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the post to find
      Returns:
      the API representation of the post

    • getAllPostMeta

      @Query("SELECT posts.id, posts.post_content, au.username as authorUsername, COALESCE(lc, 0) as likeCount FROM posts LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, username FROM users GROUP BY id) au ON au.id = posts.post_user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_id, count(*) lc FROM likes GROUP BY post_id) ltc ON ltc.post_id = posts.id;") List<PostMetadataEntity> getAllPostMeta()
      Select and build API representations of all post entities
      Returns:
      API representations of all post entities

    • getPostMetaByUsername

      @Query("SELECT posts.id, posts.post_content, au.username as authorUsername, COALESCE(lc, 0) as likeCount FROM posts LEFT JOIN (SELECT id, username FROM users GROUP BY id) au ON au.id = posts.post_user_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT post_id, count(*) lc FROM likes GROUP BY post_id) ltc ON ltc.post_id = posts.id WHERE au.username = :username;") List<PostMetadataEntity> getPostMetaByUsername(String username)
      Select and build an API representation of a post entity based on the username of the author
      Parameters:
      username - the username to search on
      Returns:
      API representations of the user's post entities
